text: Lens is a municipality of the district of Sierre in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. ==Villages== Crans-sur-Sierre, Flanthey, Chelin, Vaas, Les Condémines, Saint-Clément and Valençon. ==Gallery== File:Statue du ChristRoi.jpg|Statue du Christ Roi File:Chelin.jpg|Chelin File:Lens Valais countryside.jpg|Lens ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:Municipalities in Sierre
title: Lens, Switzerland
